attributes.action: Ban rawhide products for dogs from sale in uk
attributes.additional_details:
Rawhide products are dangerous to dogs. A misguided myth says that they are leftover products from the food industry. They are not. They are a leftover from the leather industry. 
They are full of chemicals and glues and dyes. Most are imported from China
They simply are not safe for any animal to eat.
attributes.background: I would like to see rawhide products withdrawn from sale all across the UK
